name: Adversity Andy
description:
Adversity Andy is a foddian game about a little frog trying to climb as high as he can.
Climb through 4 different themed areas on a massive spiraling tower, discover shortcuts or fall right back down to where you started!
Charge your jumps and use your flatulent double jumps to reach dizzying heights previously unknown to frog-kind. 

An experienced player should be able to beat the game anywhere between 10 minutes to over an hour. So don't feel bad if you don't make it on the first try, this game is HARD. But if you do manage to beat it, leave a comment with your time and maybe a screenshot and I'll put it in a high score section!

Made for Ludwig Jam in 10 days. (although I only actually managed to put in 2)

Art, programming, animation, sound and design by Knut "Fatsheep" Steffenrem

Featuring wonderful music made by the amazing AnchorlightForge!

anchorlight · UpYouGo Complete Loop

CONTROLS:

  • Movement: WASD or left stick
  • Jumping: Space or A
  • Sprinting: Shift or X
  • Toggle music: M

HINTS, TIPS AND TRICKS:

  1. You have full control in the air after your first jump
  2. To fully charge a jump takes exactly a second
  3. Be careful not to accidentally double jump as it sends you in an uncontrollable fall
  4. Sometimes you can save yourself from a fall if you haven't used your double jump
  5. Some jumps have shortcuts or alternate routes
  6. Lost on where to go next? Try jumping straight up to see if you find a way
  7. For the later parts it will be useful to be familiar with exactly how far the double jump goes and how the timing works

Continued development?

Do you wanna see this game polished up, extended and expanded upon? Let me know in the comments! I'm strongly considering doing it as I feel this game might have it's place and audience. A more complete version of this game would feature something like:

  • Longer/more/different level(s)
  • Better sound and music design
  • An overall more polished look and artstyle
  • Peepo customization
  • NPCs?
  • Lore??
  • Collectibles and secrets?
